attributes.action: IMPOSE FINES ON COUNCILS DUMPING RECYCLING INTO LANDFILL AND INCINERATORS INSTEAD OF REUSING RECYCLING.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS PER THE ARTICLE IN THE DAILY TELEGRAPH ON THE 20TH DECEMBER 2008 REGARDING THREE OUT OF FOUR COUNCILS DUMPING RECYCLING INSTEAD INSTEAD OF PROCESSING IT FOR RE-USE AND AVOIDING LANDFILL.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
